directions: Mix cheese spread, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, and garlic powder in a mixing bowl.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) jar pasteurized process cheese spread (such as Cheez Whiz®)
1/3 cup prepared horseradish, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
title: Original Bar Cheese Spread
